dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and hachures.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Deutsche geograph. Meilen".
Includes legend in top right corner: Erklärung.
Shows topography, drainage, islands surrounding continent, political boundaries.
Profile view: Das Profil, in dunkelster Anlage, durch Afrika in der Richtung von Tripoli nach Capetown. Maßst. v. Höhe u. Basis = 1 : 100.
